website_summaries.verdict: A decent styling tool with one drawback: the butterfly clips do not work for everyone.
pros: Rapid heating time (five minutes or less)
cons: Clips tend to mark hair, slip out of place, and break

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE! I have long thick hair & they ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE! I have long thick hair & they work perfectly. I don't set them for long (15 mins max) so I get more volume than curl. The photo is after 10+ hours of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Love! :)
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I recommend having your hair be slightly damp with a little bit of mousse before using the roller. I bought 2 sets (because I have long thick hair) and I used the 8 biggest to do my whole head. I just wrapped the big ones not too tight and had no problem with kinks from the slits and used the clips. I would say the clips work best if you clip underneath the roll and not on top. I also bought pins just in case for the smaller rollers and I put one under each bang just at the scalp for volume without rolling into a full curl. I recommend setting with a flexible hairspray.
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Came with hair and Residue!
customer_reviews.text: Received this today. Opened it.... the clips were caked in residue and hair was on the barrels and the inside of the container. I requested a return immediately. Unfortunately, it was the first set of curlers I ever bought and was very excited about them. Hopefully i will find a good set somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Glass

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I have owned. The previous set I had for many years. I was glad to see I could get a replacement and they didn't really change the product that much. The big changes is the clips. My old set had metal clips and this new set has plastic comb clips. I actually like the new comb-like clips better for my hair. I have longer thick hair. These heat up really fast. Just don't leave them too long or they an get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: k9fan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped getting hot
customer_reviews.text: These stopped getting hot after 10 months...they get barely warm. I had the unit replaced as it was still under warranty. My second unit is now doing the same thing after just 5 months. Conair will only use my original purchase date, so I will not get a warranty replacement. I am very disappointed in the short life of these rollers. So, I will not be purchasing another Conair product. As a side note, the customer service employees are very nice and helpful, but my unit is out of warranty when I expected them to honor the date of the 2nd unit received. I am escalating my request, so we will see if they honor their warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Clips won't hold
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that the clips that come with the rollers won't hold and the rollers just come undone. I tried the old fashioned metal pins for hot rollers and they didn't work either. They would be great rollers if they would actually stay in your hair. I wish I'd sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Will burn your head flesh!
customer_reviews.text: First use of the product...I heated it up for 5 minutes and rolled 2 rollers into my hair before I got the BURN! Holy cow my scalp was on fire! Apparently the metal ends heat up to a point of flesh destruction. Perhaps the device depends on having long hair to wrap several times around the rollers thereby jacking up the actual roller so it does not touch your flesh. My hair is mid length and wraps just once. I don't know how Conair sells any of these units.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Had an old model
customer_reviews.text: There was an older model like this one with the purple and grey, but instead of 2 sizes, it had 3 sizes and awful plastic clips, I much prefer these metal ones because they don't dent and crimp the hair like the others did. I almost never used the smallest size, so the loss of the smaller curler doesn't bother me, either. I've only used it a couple times, but it's decent. Don't think one should have to spend so much more to get decent clips, though. Kind of absurd, a product should come with effective pieces to begin with, not charge people extra for them after the fact.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding some waves and volume.
customer_reviews.text: I have moderately thick waist length and very curl resistant Asian type hair. I had to buy 2 of these to do the job. Its holds up pretty well and I love the volume it gives. I just wish it would warm up faster. I let it sit for about 3 to 5 minutes before I start wrapping my hair. It tangles on the purple clips but not to the point of frustration. Overall I do like the product and it prevents much less damage than my curling irons.
customer_reviews.author: ♥️ Mrs. Arb

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product and terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: This hot roller set worked well with moderate use for a little over a year. Now the full front row will not heat up at all and the back row gets so hot, it is like touching the burning barrel of a curling iron. You cannot hold the rollers without burning you skin and even after letting it cool for a few minutes, my hair started smelling like it was burning. I called customer service and they do not offer replacement or repair past 1 year limited warranty. It's going in the garbage and I will choose another brand to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: JShopper

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: These work just fine and leave less lines with the clips than my previous set did. They heat up VERY fast. I recommend unplugging it after the rollers start getting close to too hot to handle. They stay plenty hot enough to roll with. There is no switch because it's unsafe to keep these kinds of appliances plugged in even if the switch is off according to the directions. Just unplug it when you're done with it. Definitely need hair spray to get that volume and to keep it from falling after a few minutes. I am very satisfied with my purchase and would recommend to anyone who is looking for volume and waves/big curls.
customer_reviews.author: talijane

customer_reviews.title: Adds volume but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: These curlers definitely add volume, but my fine hair loses the curl within a few hours. The clips did leave crinkles in my hair when placed the normal way, so I started putting the clip on the side of the roller so it was just clipping the purple end piece and it still held the roller without marking marks in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Something I didn’t expect...
customer_reviews.text: The Jumbo Hot Rollers that I received had two sizes of rollers but only on size clip. The big clip obviously doesn’t hold the smaller size roller securely & that same clip doesn’t do a great job holding the large size curler either. I have shoulder length thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sea

customer_reviews.title: Big design flaw. No room for pins.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I like these BUT... dislike the design flaw: there are no place to hold the tiny curler clips!!! I would not have bought this had I realized this. Even my grandmothers hot rollers from 1970 had a space to hold her clips, so it is not revolutionary. I loose everything, I misplace huge keys with 6 keys on the chain. this drives me nuts that I have to keep this in the box so I can not loose the pins! The heat like other hot roller sets. I regret I bought this one, and not the other that holds the pins. Also this set is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: K R TTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These do not work
customer_reviews.text: These rollers DO NOT WORK. I have naturally wavy hair and whenever I get a blowout the county curls last for days. After I used these rollers they left creases in my hair and the curls fell out in 5 minutes and left my hair looking terrible. Also, the rollers do not stay in your hair even with the clips. They continued to fall out. I will be sending this product back and getting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa raymond

customer_reviews.title: Slit Barrel = Tangled Long Hair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these rollers thinking they had a hole in the cylinder. I selected them without knowing they are the style with a slit through the cylinder that you push down onto a long flat heating element. I didn’t notice the slits on rollers in the pictures. I have long hair and prefer the barrel style with a hole that heats on a spike. My hair gets tangled in the slit on these type of rollers. Bummer! I can’t seem to find rollers with that style heating element anymore. I would love to find barrel style velvet rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not very high heat.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd set of rollers. I love the size, but the just never get hot enough, finding this size roller in other brands I have not found. The other two I still have, I travel a lot and have lost the rollers. Providing two types of clips would be nice. The wire is better. The claw clips created a dent so you have to strategically place them to the side to avoid a dent and the rollers fall out. Wish the would heat up just a little hotter!
customer_reviews.author: ds3811

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why this is listed as having "Bonus Super Clips"? The 12 clips that come with this unit are listed on the side of the box as being part of the curler set. I really don't like this setter because it doesn't curl my hair at all. It just flops right off the curler straight as when I put it in. I don't usually use any product with my hot rollers but I would definitely have to with this unit. I should have bought the other unit with 3 sizes of rollers I guess.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great item
customer_reviews.text: The rollers are very reasonably priced plus you get extra clips as a bonus! Received them a couple of days ago and have been very happy with the results. My hair is fine with an extremely slight wave to it, if it dries naturally. If I blow if dry, it will go straight. Wanted to get more body and large waves with the rollers. They accomplished my objective. They're easy to use, just plug them in. They heat up very quickly. If you want a tighter do- then leave them in longer or spray your hair before you roll your hair in them. Would highly recommend to those just looking for some body and slight waves.
customer_reviews.author: Namaste

customer_reviews.title: Heat up fast, work great!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I ever stop using hot rollers? It saves so much time getting ready and I look way more put together. I haven't had a haircut since early March (and probably won't be able to get one for awhile since we're still stuck at home) so I needed something to help with my longer-than-normal hair. I love that I can just do a rough blowdry till my hair is mostly dry, spend just a couple minutes putting it up in these, then I have really nice volume and waves that last for days #godblessdryshampoo
customer_reviews.author: Kate J.

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I dislike how cheaply made this product is in comparison to 9 years ago. Quality was so much better. I can believe how they fall off your hair so quickly. Unbeliavable! I want to attache a photo of the other ones I used to own. They were durable, nicer material and they were never part in the middle. They had a hole in the middle of the in order to get warmed. What a shame!😭
customer_reviews.author: Irma L.

customer_reviews.title: Melted Rollers
customer_reviews.text: Smelled odor after one year of use. The curlers were too hot to handle. The photos show the melted roller and others that are charred.
customer_reviews.author: Dora E

customer_reviews.title: Clips are horrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after searching several times which curlers are best for long, thick, coarse hair. I was excited when they arrived but when I used them this morning I was upset on how cheap made these clips are. I had two curlers fall out before I could even finish putting them in and had to adjust them often. There really isnt enough curlers either to be able to get all my hair done. They should come with at least 16 and better clips.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Nine

customer_reviews.title: No no/off button
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would of read other ratings before purchasing. There is a on/off button on the picture of the item but I received the item without the button. If I would of know this then I would of purchased another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast
customer_reviews.text: Gets really hot really fast, the clips work better for me then the pins, and holds my hair just as good as the pins do. They will leave lines in your hair so be careful where you place the clips. But still happy I bought it. Havent used rollers in years and havent had this long. So far nothing bad to say.
customer_reviews.author: Velma

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Plugged these in and within 30 seconds started to smell something burning and then saw smoke coming from one of the curlers. Immediately unplugged. Any longer a fire would have probably started. Not sure if I received a defective set but definitely returning.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Faulty unit received!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure I received a bad unit as every time I plug my unit in it immediately starts smoking in the middle and a violent sizzling sound erupts and I have to switch it off immediately. Even after pluging to a different socket it still smokes and sizzles. Thus I conclude that there must be something wrong with the wiring with the unit that I got. Can't use it ever again for fear of it erupting in flames!!!!! Horrid product. I request for a refund as it is electrically faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get hot enough to create curls
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would, that's what this product deserves. My second time buying these exact curlers, thinking that the first set was defective. They don't get hot enough to do create curls. It's a lot of work getting your hair all rolled up waiting 30 mins...looks same. I love hot rollers currently hunting for once that actually work let me know if anybody has found a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Leisa

customer_reviews.title: Delivery Was Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, works just as I expected it would. I wanted to let Amazon know that whoever delivered this package is a great person and someone you definitely want on your team. He first found a place on my porch that was relatively hidden from the street to leave the package for security, and then he walked to my christmas decoration that he did not knock over, picked it up and faced it to the street. It took him 5 seconds, and he didn't have to do it, but he did, and I thought that was so nice! Big Thank You for having such a wonderful person working for you.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Awful, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased hoping this would reduce the time of using a curler. I’ve used MANY curlers in my life and hoped these would be good. My hair is about mid back length so somewhat long. I wore the curlers as directed for almost 25-30 minutes and they only left a horrible kink in my hair. They didn’t curl whatsoever. The clips are a TOTAL farse and are the biggest pieces of junk ever. Do NOT pay for the bonus of having them...old fashion medal prongs would be better. I would NOT recommend these. The regular curling iron is a million times better and i don’t have a way to return these or get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of these rollers and would have given them 5 stars except the clips do not hold well. My hair takes curl quickly so once I get them all in, I start taking them out. By that time many are beginning to fall out on their own. Wish they could have come up with a tighter or better clip. Otherwise, these would be the best. The smaller roller is larger then the large roller on most other sets and I need big rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hot Rollers
customer_reviews.text: I really love these. They aren't going to give you curls but are more for waves. I have long, thick hair and use all the rollers in the set. They work very well and I have had no problem with the clamps that hold them in place. I do use them with slightly damp hair and I've found that works better than when my hair is dry. The only thing is I wish the whole set was only made up of the large rollers.
customer_reviews.author: MissGoody2Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Nothing happening at all
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how people are getting these to work. I wake up with dry hair, add mousse, let the curlers heat up for approximately 15 minutes, apply the curlers, wait 20 minutes, take them out- and nothing. Hair is mostly still stick straight. I have naturally pin straight hair and these are not doing anything. Maybe if I put product in after showering the night before it will help, but I have tried these 2 or 3 times now with no results to speak of so I am thinking they just dont get hot enough.
customer_reviews.author: BJensen

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Conair was a name brand I could always count on to be high quality and a very effective hair care product. But this set of rollers really disappoints! There is no on/off switch, you just unplug it. The clips come on 3 separate cardboard pieces, not contained within the roller unit, and they don't hold the rollers in my hair! A very poorly designed product!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Taylert

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting these to be great but not very impressed. When it stated "BONUS super clips included, I thought it would come with both the plastic and metal clips, taking Bonus to mean something Extra. The plastic clips don't hold the curlers in place securely, (curlers flop) doubling them helped a bit, but it is annoying. Additionally, I can't even find extra large and jumbo metal pins to purchase separately. Overall, I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Phyl

customer_reviews.title: One of the best set of electric rollers I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: The rollers heat up very quickly and they are not too hot for touching them. The 2 sizes work well for my medium length hair. I like the coating on the rollers too. I feel they are not as harsh on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: I can only assume the electronics in this product are so POOR that the maker didn’t trust it wouldn’t catch fire ...
customer_reviews.text: There is no OFF switch. I can only assume the electronics in this product are so POOR that the maker didn’t trust it wouldn’t catch fire unless it is unplugged. I hate this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Richards

customer_reviews.title: This product should be taken off the market. These ...
customer_reviews.text: This product should be taken off the market. These rollers sit directly ON your scalp and they are very hot!! I should have taken into consideration all of those other reviews that mentioned they were burned. If your hair is longer and can be wrapped around the roller more than once, you might be okay but for shorter/mid-length hair, don't do it unless your are into scalp burns. It has been several hours now since I removed the rollers from my head and my scalp still hurts. I am no stranger to hot rollers, I know how to use them but these rollers are no joke.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Long, thick, straight hair
customer_reviews.text: The plastic super clips leave creases. I had to go over creases with a straightening iron. I have long, thick, straight hair and this curled it beautifully...for about 45 min to an hour, then it went flat. I used heat protectant and a light hairspray the first time. I even tried to curl it a second time but with mousse instead of hairspray. No dice, still went flat. Maybe I have too much hair, maybe my hair is too heavy, for whatever reason - it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Belladonna

customer_reviews.title: How sad. That night I went to Amazon and shopped ...
customer_reviews.text: One night I found my fiance and her daughter pulling all Thier curlers together to make one set. How sad. That night I went to Amazon and shopped a subject is know nothing about. I settled for these because of the fast heat and ceramic core. What I did know is that jumbo was a must. I took a chance and bought 2 and thank goodness I hit a home run. Both loved it. And trust me they are picky about their beauty products.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Conair Xtreme Instant Heat Jumbo And Super Jumbo Hot Rollers
customer_reviews.text: Conair Xtreme Instant Heat Jumbo And Super Jumbo Hot Rollers; Bonus Super Clips Included - Amazon Exclusive Overall rating. The best as far as I can rate! 5 plus and you can order extra rollers to use if there is not enough. jumbo and extra large. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: RioRio

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave it unattended!
customer_reviews.text: In the last couple of days my unit has become extremely hot and melted a couple of rollers. I emptied it and dumped out excessive hair and when I plugged it in, it started to smoke! However, conair was very easy to deal with and is sending me a replacement after they receive this one. I’ve had this unit before and it eventually did get too hot . It was replaced as well. (2 days later and nothing from Conair to mail it back)
customer_reviews.author: Marion G.

customer_reviews.title: Meh, disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. If you have thin hair, these don't stay secured to your head because there's not enough hair to really pin down. They kind of curled my hair and the ends, but all that work and they all fell down and unraveled by the time I took them out. Maybe with better clips, but these clips do not work for baby fine hair. Waste of money if you ask me. I'll stick to my InStyler.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Elle

customer_reviews.title: Overheats...and gets so hot it enimates smoke...
customer_reviews.text: I have used hot rollers for years and have purchased this brand in the past. Shortly after I plugged in the set, rolled my hair, the unit begins to exude smoke, so I unplugged it immediately. Often I leave the room with hot rollers plugged in...I would not suggest doing that with this set. As far as the curl, that was great!
customer_reviews.author: C. MacK

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These heat up really fast, I usually let them heat up for 15 minutes or so though because it doesn't feel like they get hot enough after a couple of minutes. There are 2 different sizes, 8 large sizes and 4 extra large. The clips fit the large size well but don't fit the extra large very well. I feel like I would be happier with this if the whole set was just the large size. It does give your hair nice volume but doesn't seem to last very long either and my hair usually holds curl very well.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn B.

customer_reviews.title: missing the wire clips
customer_reviews.text: The photos on Amazon indicated that the product included the U-shaped wire clips which I much prefer over the "butterfly" style clips that were advertised as a bonus. I received only the butterfly clips and have difficulty using them. In addition, I cannot find replacement clips either on Amazon or the Conair website. I suppose I'll get used to it, but am very disappointed that I did not receive the exact product shown online.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma J

customer_reviews.title: Not the conair of yore.
customer_reviews.text: Conair is just not what it used to be. There was an intense burning smell, followed by smoke when I first used it. There are parts of the plastic portion of the rollers that touch the heating element. The smoke doesn’t still happen, but the smell does. And they’re just not as easy to grip and handle as the ones I had ten years ago. Blah. Bulky case, cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY. TOXIC SMOKE!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered 7/26/20. I unboxed it 7/28/20, plugged it in and immediately white, toxic smelling smoke started to come from the area of the metal center part. The smoke not only smelled bad but it burned my eyes! I looked at some other reviews and see this is an issue. DON’T BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris O.

customer_reviews.title: Did not curl my hair and burnt my head
customer_reviews.text: These are very large rollers. I tried them twice. I have fine, but not thin straight hair that is easy to curl usually. These would not curl my hair. They have nothing on them to grip your hair either. They have some kind of felt on them. They did stay in with the clips thou. And they burned my head. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Vickies Place

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these 6 months ago and they have already broken. They actually started to smoke and caught one of the rollers on fire because it melted. Do NOT buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Boyd

customer_reviews.title: No blow drying needed.
customer_reviews.text: My arms are too tired to keep the blow dryer in that certain position to do my "do". I just cheat by using this instant curling set anytime. My hair is a bit freezy so to straighten it all I just pick a curler roll. Let it cool a bit and remove it. I've been using this for a few years and hope they keep making these. It is a good thing to spoil yourself and get to work on time. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Tried twice to get to heat up but had to return. After more than 45 minutes still didn’t turn the light white or get it hot enough to curl. Not sure if it needed more time but I don’t have the time to wait that long. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Had the older version of these rollers. New clips are much better and don't leave a dent in the hair where they grasp. Also heats up VERY fast. Don't wait to long to use or they will be too hot and burn scalp or hair. Last set lasted over 2 years and I traveled. With them on a regular basis which added a lot of wear and tear on the case. Size is great and provides a bigger wave/more body look vs tight curls. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use it on extensions and it works well for shiny big waves. I liked it so much I am purchasing a second for my “snowbird” winter location. Too large for travel and it does not dry hair. Hair must be dry before using. Very easy and quick to use.
customer_reviews.author: MI Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: Got mine a couple weeks ago and I have used them about 4/5 times. They heat up quick, the clips work great with them and if I clip the roller more towards the back they leave no marks at all. I have corse hair about 4/5 inches past my shoulders, I use all the rollers, putting the 4 larger ones in the top and 2 sides. After about 15 minutes I take out & I finger comb and hit with some spray. The curls and body last about 6/8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Leaves kinks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for NYE 2020. I have long very thick hair that doesn’t hold a curl well but I thought I would try these after reading the reviews. They did not do well. They left links toward the root and the curls were not very tight. I ended up having to go back through and using a curler to fix most of it. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Tupa

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T HOLD ANY HEAT
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this out but no matter how long it was plugged in, the rollers never got hot enough to hold any type of curl. I have other electric curlers, but wanted to purchase these because of the size. My other curlers heat up to the max and I have to be careful how long I leave them on or I end up like Shirley Temple. These Conair's are absolutely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Mamist

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful...it get really hot!
customer_reviews.text: The curlers do work well. but I dislike that I have to unplug it after each use. My last set had an on-off switch and it remained plugged into the wall. Also, these curlers get SO hot they burn my head or ear and I end up putting tissue on my skin so it does not "burn." I wish the company made the same ones I had from 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Hildmat

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Don't Buy - They are dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. First time plugged in, within minutes there was burning smell from the item. It melted the tops of the rollers and they melted, the foam burnt. We tried it again but same thing. Dangerous with hot melted plastic on heat thing you put them on. Can't even be bothered returning them. Never ever buy this product. Tried to put one in hair and burnt fingers on melted plastic and got melted plastic on hair. Can't say how dangerous this is.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Mead

customer_reviews.title: Advertisement hog wash and product doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. It really doesn’t even rate a 1. It is unfortunate that I didn’t try it within the time allotted for returns. It was advertised to curl your hair with big bodacious curls without drying it out (protective covering on curlers to protect your hair from the heat). That is hog wash! My hair wasn’t curled, and it felt like straw after having the curlers in. I’m very dissatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Set!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived quickly and in good condition. This is a very nice set of heat rollers. I really like that it has several jumbo rollers instead of just a couple like most others. They heat up fairly quickly. I also like that they came with the jaw clips and the regular roller clips. I prefer the jaw clips which is one of the main reasons I made the decision to purchase this set.
customer_reviews.author: Granny of 7

customer_reviews.title: Nice curlers, worthless clips!
customer_reviews.text: These curlers get hot and heat up very quickly. They work well IF you can get the clips to hold! The clips are horrible and fall out if you attempt to move after putting the curlers in your hair. The clips are not strong enough and are very flimsy. Bottom line, nice curlers but don’t waste your money because you will be picking up curlers and clips constantly after they fall off of your head!
customer_reviews.author: mj13

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally thicker, wavy hair and these do not get hot enough to do anything to my hair. I have medium length hair and it’s possible they were too big to do anything to my hair, but I tried several different ways to use these and they didn’t work. I feel like the main issue was that they didn’t get hot enough.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Defective package and burnt my fingers trying to use
customer_reviews.text: I kept burning my fingers. There was no room for me to hold onto them to get them in my hair. Also, mine were blue and looked different than these. MY light didn't work either. It says to wait for the light to turn on/off so you know when they are hot enough and my light always just stayed on. I had to return them unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn S

customer_reviews.title: I tried the Frieda set of rollers and that is also a really nice set of large rollers but they were too big ...
customer_reviews.text: I have shoulder length hair and was looking for a hot roller set that would put only a slight curl in my hair after it is blown out. These rollers fit the bill. The purple rollers are the smaller of the two rollers and there are plenty of them to cover my head of hair. I wish the set came with wires as I feel they hold the rollers more securely to your head but the clips work okay and I do not notice clip marks on my hair. I tried the Frieda set of rollers and that is also a really nice set of large rollers but they were too big for the length of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Click Chick

customer_reviews.title: Worst hot roller system ever—do not stay in your hair
customer_reviews.text: I am sickingly frustrated with how such a simple device as you rollers can be made this poorly. They will not stay in. The clips are not big enough, and the clip system is just not good regardless. The rolls do not stay in your hair. It’s incredibly frustrating. And the flicking as well as the clips leave kinks. Skip this. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: skye

customer_reviews.title: love the rollers but the accompanying clip holders aren't great
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd set, love the rollers but the accompanying clip holders aren't great. They are light, thin and didn't hold the rollers in place for long. One came apart when I opened it to clip in place. I gave it 4 stars because the rollers and case are good quality, only the clips need improvement
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste yor money
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product. I purchased the curlers in December after my other set burned out after 1 year. I originally thought it was my bad luck that the first set burned out. But in less than 6 months the curlers are melting, not heating up or getting so hot in 5 mins they burn you when you try to use them. So disappointed in Conair that I will not purchase their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Things Kids

customer_reviews.title: NO pins included, "super" clips not so super
customer_reviews.text: Very frustrated. I read in the Q&A that pins are included. They're not, so take note. My hair curls easily and the stupid "bonus, super" clips leave ridges. Why do they call the clips "bonus"? Also, they're bulky and you can't store them with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Clary C.

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - no on/off switch. Misleading picture.
customer_reviews.text: It specifically shows the model with an on and off switch but there is none! What a scam. If I hadn’t already thrown the box away I would return it. I was happy to find a cheaper model with decent ratings with an on/off switch... alas it’s the same thing as the picture minus the buttons. I’m pretty disappointed as it’s the only reason I chose this model. Misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Powell

customer_reviews.title: I love these hot rollers but this order I received was defective
customer_reviews.text: I think mine were made on a Friday. After the third or fourth use, the roller starting getting scorching hot. Then I think the heating element was defective and a few rollers melted onto the heating bar. I’m sending them back. Bummer because I really like these rollers. I will get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Quapaw Woman

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: This set does exactly what I wanted. It gives smooth styling without curl. I have thick, medium length hair and I am not a person who can work well with a round brush and dryer. Update— I went to use my rollers this morning and smoke came out. When I touch the roller it was too hot to touch. Then I noticed the smoke. They are now in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Casey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Hot rollers, again!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like I am returning to the 1990's with hot rollers... luckily these don't require hot water and "pins" that fall out. I like these just fine with regard to the curlers and the case, the clips are easy to use. I would have liked to have a bag for the clips when not in use, they have no place to go, also, auto shut-off would be good. Really good. So, based on those two issues I rated the curlers a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BIG ROLLERS!
customer_reviews.text: These rollers, I haven't used yet, but I am happy with how big they are. The only thing that would make them better is if there was a compartment that would hold the clips. But no worries, I just put them in a large zip-lock for storage and when I use them, just dump them in a bowl for ease to get to.
customer_reviews.author: aunt emma

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I saw the reviews seemed to be pretty good, I always do my research. First couple uses I loved the curl in the beginning but a couple hours later my hair was straight. I tried hairspray, texture spray you name it hair went flat. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chelseybelle

customer_reviews.title: Favorite styling tool
customer_reviews.text: I love hot rollers. Wish there was a way to purchase more of the metal clips . Those get lost easily and the top always seems to break on these rollers. I have some from years ago and the top lid always manages to break very easily . Besides that, they are great and the product arrived fast. The price was great. It had everything in tact .
customer_reviews.author: Erin T.

customer_reviews.title: Great value Headsets!!
customer_reviews.text: FIrst off, this is a great value for the money, its hands-down a very solid headset. I have large ears and these completely cover them while also providing decent noise cancellation.. The build quality seems very good and as for the mic, it works fine and I have had no issues for this week of use. The sound quality is just right with the bass being the perfect amount to groove with. The mic itself from what I've tested sounded clear to me which I didn't have a problem with when it came to communicating with anyone. The mic stays attached the entire time, so that may be a negative to some. overall its a great gaming headset!!!
customer_reviews.author: boyee

customer_reviews.title: It heats up in five minutes, it's great.
customer_reviews.text: My fourth one; have one sent in both my kids houses up North for my visits, they still work great; and I have had this one for five years using daily until it started to malfunction. Love the product, will keep buying as needed. Gave a 3 for travel because it is bulky. Takes up a lot of room in luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: There is no way to know when they are ready for use.
customer_reviews.text: I read that there is supposed to be a light that goes off when they are heated and ready for use... however I have left them plugged in for close to an hour and the light never goes off notifying me whether they are ready or not. Otherwise just ok...
customer_reviews.author: Gurbinder

customer_reviews.title: I have to set each roller on the granite counter to cool for a bit before attempting to hold them and ...
customer_reviews.text: Burning plastic smell can't be healthy to inhale. Not pleasant regardless. And the rollers are so hot your fingers get toasted with every use. I have to set each roller on the granite counter to cool for a bit before attempting to hold them and place them. Rollers don't stay well on fine hair, nor when you use in a vertical manner. Even with extra clips that wrap fully around the whole roller (not included). Create a good result in terms of curls but the "getting there" is the challenge.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Cheep plastic. Good curl.
customer_reviews.text: They curl my dry layered hair nicely. No bag for clips. Pieces are cheep plastic. Clips are flimsy, not built to last but curls my hair very nixce. Will not dry even damp hair. Rollers are hot as he'll, recomend you wear heat gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Mase.coyote

customer_reviews.title: I read the other reviews prior to purchase and disregarded ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews prior to purchase and disregarded the comments about no on/off switch because this was my previous brand & model of hot rollers that I was replacing and had the switch on my previous set. I was also careful to select the model that depicted the on/off switch when ordering. I was surprised that in fact, there is no on/off switch as per the reviews. Wasn't too worried...just plug/unplug. However, the quallity isn't the same as the last set identical as these. Additionally, the clips that come with it are no only bluky to store, but they are made of very thin, cheap plastic and dont hold the rollers in well. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ann - San Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: So my hair is already curly I just need a little help with definition. This just didnt work. The coils didnt get hot enough and it's a weird process to roll hot things into your hair. Also it was just awkward to use, I'll stick with my curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: Christina H

customer_reviews.title: Heats up well but....
customer_reviews.text: The negative thing about this particular Conair hot rollers is its lack of having an on/off switch. it has to be plugged in to begin heating. I have owned two previous Conair hot rollers and they both had a small switch to turn it on. That way you can leave it plugged in and just turn the switch when you want it to come on.
customer_reviews.author: nilawatson

customer_reviews.title: Wanted it to work so badly!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is pretty long so while these somewhat curled my hair the curl didn't hold more than an hour. I never have a problem with curls holding when I use a regular curling iron. Was disappointed, but I'm keeping them in case I decide to chop off my hair and see if it helps!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: ***Updated***Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: ***So I thought I would give them a 3rd try and I have to say that now I am just disgusted that I wasted time and money on these. They might work if they had an actual clip that held them in your hair. However, the skinny paper clips they come with are a disgrace. In the garbage they go.*** That was a waste of money and time. They barely curled my hair, my hair curls easy and the pins do not hold the rollers in. So incredibly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: DISGUSTING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT WAS USED!!!! IT WAS COVERED IN SOMEONE ELSE'S HAIR!!! IT ALSO DID NOT INCLUDE THE OWNER'S MANUAL!!! IF YOU REALLY WANT THIS SET, ORDER IT FROM SOMEWHERE ELSE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie J.

customer_reviews.title: Old school rollers ! Work great ! Nice and hot
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these ! Moved to Florida and my hair turned to crap. Soooo I had to go old school with rollers . Well, I love them ! They heat up fast and get very hot so be careful . Takes a couple tries to get it right but now I have it down !
customer_reviews.author: DONNA  Atlantic beach , Florida

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I thought I’d give rollers a try. So difficult to tuck the ends in properly so they don’t come out all messed up. I think it’s my fault. I’m gonna stick with my curling iron
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dad approves of hot looking waves!
customer_reviews.text: My hair looks so stoked! I love my banging waves. Best product to use before homecoming. I have not wash my hair for 6 days and the waves are still looking good. My dad said it looks pretty hot and cool. Father approved! Thanks gods for this banging hot curlers.
customer_reviews.author: Corpulent Ella

customer_reviews.title: I like these so much that I bought four sets!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these hot rollers for many years. I have one set at my house and one set at two other houses where I travel to and stay. I use these almost every day and finally wore out my first old set. I really like the new and improved roller clips that came with my set. Be sure to use a hair product to hold the curl, let the rollers cool before removing from your hair, then let your hair cool down before styling the curls , and the curls will last all day!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice from Maryland

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT Buy this item!
customer_reviews.text: My hot rollers arrived and unfortunately i was not able to use them for about 35 days. When i plugged them in, the instructions say wait for the white light and then they are ready. The white light never comes on and the rollers do not heat up enough. When i contacted "online support" through Amazon, they were NOT Helpful at all and stated they cannot exchange them for me because it is past 30 days. What a rip off!! Now I have hot rollers that do not work and lost money. I am going to contact Conair in hopes they will be a bit more receptive. Cheap product! Poor customer service
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Not enough heat in roller to make a curl
customer_reviews.text: I only use curlers sometimes so I have only use this product four times in the two months I have owned it. I waited too long to process return. I now cannot return it. The rollers and clips are nice and as described. But the product does not heat up as high as I would expect. My 15 year old small rollers with wired clips works much better and I will return to using them. I have long hair and I would have expected to get a curl out of the process. I get no curls after leaving in for at least 1/2 hour, or until cooled. The heat is just not there in the roller.
customer_reviews.author: eques27

customer_reviews.title: Love the rollers BUT NOT THE CLIPS!
customer_reviews.text: The wire clips are much more effective in keeping the rollers in tightly. They are sooo much better than these plastic clips! These clips don't keep the rollers firmly in your hair and leave an indentation in your hair. Not Good!!
customer_reviews.author: DkC

customer_reviews.title: These "Super Clips" DO NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand of hot rollers for years but it was time for a new set. I decided to purchase these because they had "Bonus Super Clips". Strangely I thought this set would also include the metal clips because the Super clips were a bonus. Bonus usually indicates something extra but in this case, not so. I have long thick hair and these clips would not hold the rollers in place. By the time I was done putting the rollers in, they had all fallen out. Very disappointed indeed. I have tried to locate replace metal clips but have had no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo and Super Hot Rollers
customer_reviews.text: I needed larger Hot Rollers for my longer hair. These roller have done their job. It came with clips to hold the rollers in place, but there is not place in the roller case to store them. I had to tape a small snack bag on the top of the case to keep them together. Good Hot Roller for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Rollers -- Bad Clips!
customer_reviews.text: These rollers make it so easy to have beautiful hair going out the door every day. I have been using them DAILY for 14 years, and this is my third set. After about a month of using the new plastic hair clips that come with it now, I am very upset. They take up too much space on my head (I do have a lot of hair), and they leave visible dents in my hair that the metal roller clips never did. I miss the naturally beautiful look of the metal clips. I would pay more to have them back!
customer_reviews.author: TSmith

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eyeing these forever and finally purchased. I’m so glad I did. They heat evenly and pretty quickly. The give my hair plenty of volume. The only complaint (and it’s so minor) is that there doesn’t seem to be a place to store the clips with hot rollers. Not a huge deal for me but some may find it inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Emie237

customer_reviews.title: Definitely deserving 5 star review
customer_reviews.text: I have hair extensions and these hot rollers are perfect for my hair. So easy to use, they stay in nice and the curl holds well, in the picture shown that was 5 hours after taking the hot rollers out! 5 star product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Meegz Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Good rollers!
customer_reviews.text: These are the 3rd set I’ve bought (over a 20 year period). And they work the best for my hair, more for body/volume and a soft curl than for a structured curl.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

product_meta.title: Conair Xtreme Instant Heat Jumbo And Super Jumbo Hot Rollers; Bonus Super Clips Included - Amazon Exclusive
product_meta.description: Style Name:BONUS: SUPER CLIPS (AMAZON EXCLUSIVE)For big, bodacious curls in record time, look no further than this set of Instant Heat jumbo rollers from Conair. A dozen 1-1/2-inch diameter rollers heat up in just two minutes, so you don't have to start plotting three days in advance to get your curls in progress. Twelve clips are included to hold the rollers in place. This is a modernized version of the roller sets of yesteryear: it's compact, lightweight, efficient, and the velvety covering on the rollers helps protect your hair from heat damage.
feature_bullets: Ceramic-infused technology – for heat transfer and long-lasting curls
With a dozen rollers that come in jumbo and super jumbo sizes, you can create big, bouncy salon-style curls
More heat protection with twice the flocking of competitive products
Includes: 12 ceramic flocked rollers of two different sizes; 1.) Four 1 3/4-inch super jumbo rollers 2.) Eight 1 1/2-inch jumbo rollers
Bonus: Super Clips included allowing for a secure hold

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
